projectData.name: Eggscape
projectData.info: A Netflix style app made in the final week of the Tech Educators Bootcamp. We made this as team tackling Api's and Relational Databases
projectData.by: Jake Darby, Richard Goodacre and Theo Reeves

projectData.name: A Social Network
projectData.info: A Social Network made by me, exploring relational databses where uses can make posts. Users make like others posts, edit or delete their own
